At Facebook, 26-year-old founder and CEO Mark Zuckerberg calls the shots in an entrepreneurial culture that has enticed dozens of engineers to leave Google Inc. to work for the social networking company. My goal is to run Google Inc. at the pace and with the soul and passion of a startup, Mr. Page said in a Thursday interview. great boss, and I'm not just saying that,'' he said. ''He's very loyal, he's very honest, and he just wants that in return.'' He continued: He smells fear though, he's like a wolf. So if you put up to 50 hours a week into perfecting one dance only for some b***** idiot, if you excuse the expression, to slag it off then it hurts you emotionally. ''It's live TV with millions watching, so you're going to react, stand up for yourself- or at least I am.
